title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Beats the Odds, Winning $282K Reward
contentSnippet: A solo Bitcoin miner defied the odds and won a block reward worth around $282,000 with the help of mining service, Solo CKPool.

title: Sorry Gooners: OpenAI's Erotic ChatGPT Delayed Into 2026
contentSnippet: Sam Altman breaks his December promise as OpenAI delays ChatGPT's adult content feature into at least Q1 next year.

title: DOT Sinks 2% After Breaking Key Support
contentSnippet: The Polkadot token erased earlier gains amid elevated volume, falling from a high of $2.09 to $1.97.

title: Hedera Tumbles 4% as Altcoins Continue to Suffer
contentSnippet: Hedera's native token retreated from resistance levels as institutional volume surged during key reversal hour.

title: Tether Considers Tokenizing Stock Amid $20 Billion Fundraise: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Stablecoin issuer Tether moved to prevent equity sales as Bloomberg reports plans to raise funds at a $500 billion valuation.

title: Circle, Ripple, Paxos, Fidelity and BitGo Get Banking Charters Approved by OCC
contentSnippet: Circle, Ripple among five stablecoin issuers conditionally approved for national banking charters as market hits $313 billion.

title: Five Crypto Firms Win Initial Approvals as Trust Banks, Including Ripple, Circle, BitGo
contentSnippet: The firms have obtained conditional approval from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency to convert into national trust banks.

title: Ripple, Circle and BitGo secure conditional approval for US banking charters
contentSnippet: Coinbase , Stripe-owned Bridge and Crypto.com have also applied to become federally chartered banks in the U.S.

title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $90K as AI Worries Drag Nasdaq, Crypto Stocks Down
contentSnippet: Chipmaker Broadcom's 10% slide weighs on the market as Chicago Fed's Goolsbee signals more cuts than the median for 2026.

title: Pakistan, Binance Sign MOU to Explore Tokenization of $2B in State Assets: Reuters
contentSnippet: The agreement comes as Pakistan accelerates the rollout of a formal crypto regulatory framework and explores blockchain-based distribution of government-owned assets.

title: Lawmakers Say Bank of England Stablecoin Proposals Will ‘Limit Adoption, Push Activity Overseas’
contentSnippet: A CryptoUK spokesperson told Decrypt the proposed restrictions “risk undermining the UK’s ambition to lead in digital finance.”

title: Jennifer Garner to Star in Netflix Crypto Comedy 'One Attempt Remaining'
contentSnippet: The film focuses on a divorced couple racing to recover access to their now-valuable crypto before time runs out.

title: Aave community probes CoW Swap integration and Aave Labs ‘stealth privatization’ of protocol
contentSnippet: An Aave governance dispute has erupted after a delegate claimed that swap fees from Aave Labs’ new CoWSwap integration no longer reach the DAO treasury.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy's Cash Reserve Was a 'Smart' Move, Says BitMine's Tom Lee
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies Chairman Tom Lee praised Bitcoin treasury firm Strategy's massive new cash reserve. Here's why.

title: Prediction Markets Are Coming to Phantom's 20M User Via Kalshi
contentSnippet: Phantom users will be able to chat and trade Kalshi's prediction markets with any Solana-based tokens, CEO said.

title: Most Influential: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao
contentSnippet: Zhao’s exit from Binance did little to dim his prominence.

title: Most Influential: Tom Lee
contentSnippet: A longtime fixture on Wall Street, Tom Lee’s pivot to crypto comes as the traditional finance industry is increasingly embracing digital assets.

title: Most Influential: Jesse Pollak
contentSnippet: Base, the layer-2 network incubated by Coinbase, exploded in popularity this year.

title: Most Influential: David Bailey
contentSnippet: Bailey’s Strategy-inspired bitcoin treasury company, KindlyMD, exemplified the struggles of many of its peers this year.

title: Pyth launches token buyback program, allocating 33% of DAO treasury to monthly PYTH purchases
contentSnippet: The buybacks are funded by network revenue as Pyth reports rising traction, with its Pyth Pro product surpassing $1M ARR in its first month.

title: Morning Minute: Do Kwon Gets 15 Years for $40B Terra Luna Fraud
contentSnippet: The sentencing brings a measure of justice, finally, for all of those impacted by the collapse of Terra and its UST stablecoin in 2022.

title: Lucky solo bitcoin miner beats 1-in-82-year odds to win $285,000 block reward
contentSnippet: The bitcoin miner earned $284,633 for mining block 927,474 on Thursday using CKpool in a solo mining configuration.

title: Tether mulls tokenizing its stock after seeking up to $20 billion in share sales at $500 billion valuation: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Tether is reportedly considering tokenizing its stock once it completes a share sale that could be finalized at a $500 billion valuation.

title: Florida Seizes $1.5M in Dogecoin, Pepe and Solana Over Case Tied to Chinese National
contentSnippet: Prosecutors used a fugitive disentitlement statute to seize Dogecoin, Solana, and other tokens tied to a Citrus County fraud case.

title: Phantom integrates with Kalshi to bring prediction markets to its web3 wallet
contentSnippet: The integration adds real-time odds, settlement notifications, and live community chat alongside Phantom's existing trading tools.

title: New York Mandates AI Advertising Disclosures, Faces Showdown Over Trump Executive Order
contentSnippet: New York state legislation now mandates AI disclosure in advertising, while SAG-AFTRA lobbies for nationwide No Fakes Act protections.

title: DTCC subsidiary authorized to offer tokenization service for US securities beginning 2026
contentSnippet: DTCC's depository subsidiary has received an SEC No-Action Letter clearing it to offer a tokenization service for U.S. securities.

title: Save the Children’s new Bitcoin Fund seeks to maximize donation value with up to four-year holding strategy
contentSnippet: The initiative builds on the charity's early adoption of bitcoin donations to improve speed, transparency, and cost efficiency.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest picks up $15.4 million in Robinhood shares and more of its own Bitcoin ETF
contentSnippet: The investment firm continues to rebalance its fund weightings amid market volatility, with Robinhood stock closing down 9% on Thursday.

title: Coinbase to unveil prediction markets and tokenized equities next week: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Several major crypto players, including Gemini and Crypto.com, are also venturing into the growing prediction market sector.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
